problem.markdown:
Q. Digital signature can’t provide ______ for the message
( ) Integrity ( ) Confidentiality ( ) Non repudiation ( ) Authentication
Q. Digital signature uses ______ for generating valid signature
( ) Private key ( ) Public key ( ) Secret key ( ) None of the above
Q. Verification Algorithm uses ______ for validating digital signature
( ) Private key ( ) Public key ( ) Secret key ( ) None of the above
Q. Is digital signature scheme possible without public key cryptography
( ) Yes ( ) No ( ) May be exist ( ) None of the above
problem.p: Q. Digital signature can’t provide ______ for the message
Q. Digital signature uses ______ for generating valid signature
Q. Verification Algorithm uses ______ for validating digital signature
Q. Is digital signature scheme possible without public key cryptography
